discourse_list.title: EIP-2026 Fixed rent prepayment for all accounts (change H from State Rent v3 proposal)

content.content: Ethereum Improvement Proposals   State Rent H - Fixed Prepayment for accounts Ethereum Improvement Proposals (EIPs) describe standards for the Ethereum platform, including core protocol specifications, client APIs, and contract standards.
content.GPT-summary: The post is an explanation of a proposal for Ethereum Improvement Proposals (EIPs) regarding State Rent H and Fixed Prepayment for accounts. It does not involve any feedback, criticism, collaboration, or advertising. However, it can be audited and reviewed by a third party.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: Hey, I wondered if you saw my comment on the PR. I guess I should have posted it here.
Yes, I saw your comment, thank you. I have added some clarification to the EIP itself, since I did not find a good way to respond on the PR comments
